CRECSENT requires two (2) 'A' level passes in Biology and 
either Physics or Chemistry and IJMB at acceptable grade 
levels.  
 FUTO accepts  'A' level pass in  Mathematics.. It also accepts 
ND/HND upper credit  in relevant programmes.  
ILORIN accepts NCE passes in Biology and Chemistry plus the 
UTME requirements.  
UNIKINGS and BOWEN same as Microbiology.  
UNN requires  
 'A' level passes or its equivalent in Chemistry and Biology 
or Botany or Zoology in addition to the UTME 
requirements.  
NCE merit in Biology and Chemistry from a recognized 
institution, plus the university minimum entry 
requirements..  
LASU accepts two (2) 'A' leve l passes chosen from Biology, 
Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Physics.  
OAU accepts two (2) `'A' level passes in Chemistry, Botany or 
Biology  
SALEM and PAUL accept ‘A’ level passes in Biology/Zoology, 
Botany and Chemistry or any other equivalent examination. 
OSUSTECH– same as in Fisheries.  
FED-OYEEKITI  accepts two (2) 'A' level passes in any of 
Biology, Botany, Chemistry, Geography, Mathematics or 
Physics.  
GOUU for Biotechnology requires two (2)  'A' level passes in 
Chemistry and any one (1) of Phys ics, Mathematics or 
Biology. ND/NCE with good grade  relevant the 'O' level 
subjects.  
KWASU – Same as in Mathematics.  
MAKRUDI – Same as in Biochemistry.  
IBADAN requires two (2) 'A' level passes in Botany, Chemistry 
or Botany / Biology.  
EBSU accepts HND, ND upper credit and NCE merit  
respectively in the relevant programmes.
